newsitem.title: USA: Hibernia to merge with Executive Bancshares.
newsitem.headline: Hibernia to merge with Executive Bancshares.

text.p: Banking company Hibernia Corp said on Monday that it had signed a definitive agreement to merge with Executive Bancshares Inc, a privately held two-bank holding company headquartered in Paris, Texas.
Depending upon the price of Hibernia stock, shareholders of Executive Bancshares would receive either cash or Hibernia stock valued at $16.8 million, Hibernia said.

The transaction would increase Hibernia's Texas assets to $541 million and would give Hibernia a presence in Collin and Lamar counties for the first time, Hibernia said in a statement. Hibernia estimated that Executive Bancshares had $136 million in assets.
The transaction will be a tax-free pooling of interests if Hibernia stock is exchanged. Hibernia also would pay off portions of the company's outstanding debt, Hibernia added.
The merger is subject to approvals by regulators and Executive Bancshares shareholders and should be completed by the end of the third quarter, Hibernia said.
